A masterpiece.

I know I am a little late in reviewing this game, but I picked it up about several months back and was too lazy to play it. I bought it just because it was on sale, didn't really plan to play it. Well.. fast forward to this week, I started playing Portal and it is amazing. I know that the graphics may be off-putting for some, but don't let that deter you away from this game. 

Portal has got to be one the best puzzle/platformer game I've played, despite it being short (story is roughly around 2-3 hours). After you beat the Main Story, there are Advanced Puzzle Maps, which I have not started yet so I can't make any comments about that. 

Bottom line is, Portal is a great puzzle platformer, I recommend it.

One of my favorite Steam Game of 00's. It is one of the best 3rd Person Puzzle game so challenging and unique in game play. When I 1st played this game, I experienced dizziness and motion sickness but it eventually fade as I play further. I enjoyed it test after test. I'm so glad I played this again and in original version and I'm so happy that it have Part 2 with coop.
Very cool, stunning, and a game that holds up very well though it's age. A hard and easy strategy game. Recommended!

Купил игру 12 лет назад, но прошел только что....) Лучшие 3 часа моей жизни за последние 6 месяцев. Серьёзно. Играл с английской озвучкой, но русская тоже хороша, хоть и немного другая в некоторых сценах. Огромный РЕСПЕКТ людям, которые придумали сюжет. Очень хорошее приключение на вечер. Уже купил Portal 2 и заказал футболку с текстом "The cake is a lie". Кароч, всем советую пройти.
